name: Jianying Zhou 0001
content: Jianying Zhou's Home Page Jianying Zhou Professor of Cyber Security Center Director for iTrust Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD) Email: jianying_zhou@sutd.edu.sg Home: jianying.space In: sg.linkedin.com/in/jianying-zhou-15b811 Recruitment: I am looking for PhD students, PhD interns & Postdocs with interest/expertise in the area of cyber security. [iTrust hosts the world-class CPS testbeds.] Biography | Education | Areas of Interest | About SUTD | Teaching | Students | Publications | Professional Activities | Awards | Research Grants | Research Highlights | In Media | Misc Education PhD (Information Security) - Royal Holloway, University of London MSc (Computer Science) - Chinese Academy of Sciences BSc (Computer Science) - University of Science and Technology of China Areas of Interest Applied Cryptography and Network Security (ACNS) Cyber-Physical System Security (CPSS) Mobile and Wireless Security About SUTD iTrust - Centre for Research in Cyber Security ISTD - Information Systems Technology and Design Pillar PhD with scholarship - Welcome to apply MSSD - Master of Science in Security by Design, with CiMS scholarship CPS testbeds - Offer testbed as a service (TaaS) with remote access [MariOT ] Teaching 50.002 [UG] - Computation Structures (2017) 51.505 [MSSD+PhD] - Foundations of Cybersecurity (2018-2025) 51.508 [MSSD+PhD] - Secure Cyber Physical Systems (2018-2025) 51.702 [MTD] - Security by Design Project (2024-2025) PhD Students [extended list] Chuadhry Mujeeb Ahmed (2015-2019) Hamid Ghaeini (2015-2019) John Castellanos (2016-2021) Flavio Toffalini (2017-2021) Andrei Bytes (2017-2022) Bowen Liu (2018-2022) Teik Guan Tan (2019-2022) Shijie Luo (2023- ) Geovani Benita (2023- ) Anthony Yeo (2023- ) Tom Yang (2024- ) Xuna Zhan (2024- ) Publications [extended list] [citations] Jianying Zhou and Dieter Gollmann.
